page.title: 04Religion
page.content: There are two churches in Ashington:- {Church of England - SS Peter and Paul {Parish Church. Sunday Services of Holy Communion and Parish Communion take place each Sunday morning. {Incumbent: The Rev.J.Michael Walker. { }* * * * * * * * * {Methodist Church. Sunday Worship and Holy Communion are held on a Sunday morning with Junior Church at 10.30a.m. {Minister: The Rev. Douglas R. Hopwood. A United Service between the two churches is held on the 3rd. Sunday of each month. The village is currently engaged in various money-raising efforts to pay for extensive roof repairs to the Parish Church of SS Peter & Paul, parts of which date back to the 12th. Century.
